Welcome to VAVEL.com’s coverage of the 2025 NCAAF match: California Golden Bears vs Hawaii Rainbow Warriors Live Score!
California Golden Bears vs Hawaii Rainbow Warriorss live face off this Wednesday (24), at Clarence T. C. Ching Athletics Complex, at 8pm ET, for the NCAAF. The match is valid for the Sheraton Hawaiʻi Bowl, with all the plays and emotions in real time here on VAVEL.
